EmailTemplate.subject: New Projects for Building Cloud-Native Apps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Last week there were a series of project announcements from VMware and Pivotal to provide open-source projects to securely build, deploy and manage Cloud-Native applications at scale. VMware announced projects: Photon and Lightwave and Pivotal announced the Lattice <http://lattice.cf/> project for Cloud Foundry.
Learn more about these Cloud-Native Application announcements:
- Watch <http://www.vmware.com/cloudnative?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUmJb%2Bbfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk%3D> the event launch with Kit Colbert, VMware, CTO Cloud-Native Apps and James Watters, Pivotal, VP and GM Cloud Platform Group
- Read the press <http://www.vmware.com/company/news/releases/vmw-newsfeed/VMware-Introduces-New-Open-Source-Projects-to-Accelerate-Enterprise-Adoption-of-Cloud-Native-Applications/1943792?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B/DC18kX3RUmJb+bfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk=> <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/lattice-simplifies-container-clusters>announcement on the new projects Lattice
- Read the blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/lattice-simplifies-container-clusters?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B%2FDC18kX3RUmJb%2Bbfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk%3D> announcing Pivotal's Lattice
Enterprise developers can accelerate their adoption of Cloud-Native applications with VMware's leading solutions across compute, storage, and networking, providing resilient infrastructure for the next generation applications that complement Pivotal's Cloud Foundry application platform solution.
Find out <http://www.vmware.com/company/news/releases/vmw-newsfeed/VMware-Introduces-New-Open-Source-Projects-to-Accelerate-Enterprise-Adoption-of-Cloud-Native-Applications/1943792?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRomrfCcI63Em2iQPJWpsrB0B/DC18kX3RUmJb+bfkz6htBZF5s8TM3DV1BFXrlU6kEISrk=> how Pivotal and VMware are making it easier for developers everywhere to embrace Cloud-Native architectures. For more information, please contact us <https://pivotal.io/contact>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
